p: Participants reported their preferences for various policy approaches to climate change. Participants first read a statement that “People have suggested different approaches to deal with the threats that we hear come from climate change.” They then used a 7-point bipolar scale to indicate which of two approaches was closest to their own view: “Wait to take action to reduce climate risks until we know that there are real dangers” or “Take action quickly to reduce the use of fossil fuels and other activities that contribute to climate change.”
